thread.title: Josh

author: Josh
title: Josh
text: My customer service experience a few days ago was horrific.. I purchased a groupon for a stay at a hotel with "spa sevices".. once I made my purchase I booked.. upon calling to set up spa services I was informed they have to be done well in advance.. I didn't have later date that would work for my stay.. Groupon denied my refund because they are not responsible for cancelled reservations.. However I was not afforded access to the services they advertised!!
